text: But when the children of Israel cried unto the LORD, the LORD raised them up a deliverer, Ehud the son of Gera, a Benjamite, a man lefthanded: and by him the children of Israel sent a present unto Eglon the king of Moab.3.15 a Benjamite: or, the son of Jemini3.15 lefthanded: Heb. shut of his right hand
